long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the Unofficial iCheckMovies Chrome Extension.

You can switch between IMDb.com and iCheckMovies pages. You can also customize some options too.

Also you can open iCheckMovies page from the Context Menu of an IMDb.com link (secondary click on link).

Have fun!
